Articles.Content:
Okay so quick question...

At the 5 Min. mark of this video you can see what i mean.

the blue icons that do not act the same as stock HUD

is this a mod or what? lol

The UI says "way old version".

Also: "Published on: Aug 24, 2012".
It's an old Ui as Deadweasel said, I asked around for what UI it was to.

I'm actually going to guess 0.16, since Scott usually posts videos running the current release, and 0.16 was the most current when he posted that video. A quick Google image search seems to confirm the UI look for that version as well (been too far back for me to remember myself, at this point!)

Thanks guys,

i like how the fuel gauge(s) act.
